TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClrObjectFactory extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IClrObjectFactory

summary.span: 从客户端激活启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序代理。

span.span: Activates SOAP-enabled COM+ application proxies from a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 .NET Framework 在内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要直接在代码中使用类。You do not need to use the class directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromVroot (string VrootUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromVroot(string VrootUrl, string Mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromVroot (VrootUrl As String, Mode As String) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ CreateFromVroot(System::String ^ VrootUrl, System::String ^ Mode);
abstract member CreateFromVroot : string * string -> obj override this.CreateFromVroot : string * string -> obj

param.name: VrootUrl
param.span: 要激活的对象的虚拟根目录 URL。

span.span: The virtual root URL of the object to be activated.
Not used.

summary.span: 使用远程程序集的虚拟根 URL，通过 .NET 远程处理激活远程程序集。

span.span: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the virtual root URL of the remote assembly.

returns.span: 表示此类型的 实例，其区域性、参数以及绑定和激活特性均设置为 ；如果找不到 参数标识的程序集，将设置为 。

span.span: An instance of the representing the type, with culture, arguments, and binding and activation attributes set to , or if the assembly identified by the parameter is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将字符串 "？ wsdl" 追加到 `VrootUrl` ，并调用 以激活远程对象。 appends the string "?wsdl" to `VrootUrl` and calls to activate the remote object. .NET 远程处理所使用的 SOAP 版本是 RPC/编码的，而不是文档/文字，这是 SOAP 互操作性所必需的。The version of SOAP used by .NET remoting is RPC/encoded, not document/literal, which is required for SOAP interoperability. 因此， 不能用于大多数的 "Web 服务"。Therefore, will not work with most ASMX Web services. 首次运行时，需要在本地计算机上具有管理权限，因为它会创建和安装客户端代理以与远程程序集通信。 requires administrative privileges on the local computer the first time it is run, because it creates and installs a client proxy for communication with the remote assembly.

exception.span: 调用链中的调用方无权访问非托管代码。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The thread token could not be opened.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromWsdl (string WsdlUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromWsdl(string WsdlUrl, string Mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromWsdl (WsdlUrl As String, Mode As String) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ CreateFromWsdl(System::String ^ WsdlUrl, System::String ^ Mode);
abstract member CreateFromWsdl : string * string -> obj override this.CreateFromWsdl : string * string -> obj

span.span: The WSDL URL of the Web service.
Not used.

summary.span: 使用 XML Web services 的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL)，通过 .NET 远程处理激活远程程序集。

span.span: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) of the XML Web service.

returns.span: 表示此类型的 实例，其区域性、参数以及绑定和激活特性均设置为 ；如果找不到 参数标识的程序集，将设置为 。

span.span: An instance of the representing the type, with culture, arguments, and binding and activation attributes set to , or if the assembly identified by the parameter is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理传入的 WSDL，如有必要，将生成一个代理，然后激活远程对象。Processes the WSDL passed in and, if necessary, generates a proxy, then activates the remote object. .NET 远程处理所使用的 SOAP 版本是 RPC/编码的，而不是文档/文字，这是 SOAP 互操作性所必需的。The version of SOAP used by .NET remoting is RPC/encoded, not document/literal, which is required for SOAP interoperability. 因此， 不能用于大多数的 "Web 服务"。Therefore, will not work with most ASMX Web services. 首次运行时，需要在本地计算机上具有管理权限，因为它会创建和安装客户端代理以与远程程序集通信。 requires administrative privileges on the local computer the first time it is run, because it creates and installs a client proxy for communication with the remote assembly.

exception.span: 调用链中的调用方无权访问非托管代码。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The thread token could not be opened.
